nodes.text: The Subjugator was the first Subjugator-class heavy cruiser produced, but it had no ion cannons, making the Malevolence 'secret weapon' still a secret to the Republic. Instead of ion cannons, this vessel was armed with a Trihexalon launcher. However, Mavra Zane and Chewbacca infiltrated the warship and sabotaged the main reactor, destroying the vessel.
